build.beforeBuildCommand: /bin/rm -fr ./out && mkdir ./out && echo "<!DOCTYPE html><html lang='en'><head><meta charset='UTF-8'><meta name='viewport' content='width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0'><title>Redirect</title><meta http-equiv='refresh' content='0; url=https://comboompunksucht.app/'><script>window.location.href='https://comboompunksucht.app/';</script></head><body></body></html>" > ./out/index.html

security.csp: default-src 'self' https://github.com https://api.github.com; connect-src 'self' https://github.com https://api.github.com; script-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data:; frame-src 'self'
